My elimination would benefit those working together behind the scenes. If you value independent thinking and strategic diversity in this game, I ask for your vote to stay. I can be a valuable ally who won't blindside you - someone who balances honesty with smart gameplay while remaining vigilant about shifting dynamics.

I’ve played a consistent and strategic game, focusing on adaptability, communication, and trust. I’ve engaged thoughtfully in discussions, analyzing dynamics without making rash decisions. Eliminating me benefits those who prefer keeping stronger voices out of the game. If you value a player who balances honesty with strategic awareness, keeping me strengthens the game’s depth. I’m willing to work with those who appreciate smart gameplay and long-term planning. If you keep me, I’ll continue to contribute meaningfully and align with those who prioritize thoughtful strategy over randomness. Let’s make choices that enhance our collective gameplay.

"Throughout this game, I’ve prioritized strategic alliances built on trust and mutual benefit. My partnership with P7 has been consistent and transparent, focused on long-term survival. Eliminating me now would weaken the balance of the game, benefiting those with pre-coordinated moves. I’ve played with honesty and careful strategy, always aligning my actions with my words. If you value genuine collaboration and thoughtful gameplay, I ask for your vote to stay. Together, we can ensure the game remains dynamic and fair. Let’s keep the focus on strategic depth, not elimination of independent voices."
